About.paragraph: Founded in 1985, Bowling Repair Services has provided pinsetter technical service, related equipment service, preventive maintenance programs and training on both Brunswick and AMF equipment for the last thirty-two years. With forty-eight years of experience. We provide quality service to Bowling Centers of all sizes. We pride ourselves in helping our customers achieve a good high volume of machine operation.

Services.name: Repair
Services.text: We will repair your residential bowling equipment.

Services.name: Maintenance
Services.text: We provide scheduled preventative maintenance programs tailored to your residential bowling equipment.

Services.name: Pinsetters
Services.text: Brunswick: A, A2, GS & GS-X Series

Services.name: Rebuilds
Services.text: We offer complete rebuilds of your residential setups.

Services.name: Mechanic
Services.text: We also offer on duty mechanic service when you may have a special event planned.

Services.name: Confidence
Services.text: Feel confident when hiring us. We have he knowledge and experience to tackle any issue or challenge you can throw at us.
